mapper.insert: insert into address(user_id, province, city, area, address, phone, receiver, createtime, lastedittime) values (#{user_id}, #{province}, #{city}, #{area}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{receiver}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update address set province=#{province}, city=#{city}, area=#{area}, address=#{address}, phone=#{phone}, receiver=#{receiver}, state=#{state}, isdel=#{isDel}, lastedittime=now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, province, city, area, address, phone, receiver, state, isdel, createtime, lastedittime from address where id = #{id}
select id, user_id, province, city, area, address, phone, receiver, state, isdel, createtime, lastedittime from address where user_id = #{user_id}
